page.title: 09Recreation East: FINTRY
page.content:
This is a popular area for the{"sunday {afternoon run"}in the car. It has picnic sites and fairly easy{walking.}
One such short walk is to Fintry Loup, a beautiful waterfall, much visited locally.
The Carron Reservoir allows{fishing from small boats which can be hired at the eastern end.
{Bird Watchers}also visit the reservoir particularly to observe the migrating wildfowl.
Loch Walton is used by a private { {fishing}asociation, the facilities being supervised by an employee who lives by the side of the loch.
